General.Name: Zhejiang Lante Optics Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Lante Optics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells optical products in China. The company offers prisms, lenses, windows, and filters; coatings; molded micro aspherical products; mini prisms and miniature glass spherical/aspheric lenses; car rearview mirrors, logo projection lamps, and car lenses; substrate, carrier, packaged, through hole, and lithography wafers; micro prisms, small lenses, PBS prisms, and etching glasses; imaging glass aspherical lens, laser collimators, FAC lens, and optical communication lens; and automotive, projection, TOF, low light level, and special industry lenses. Its products are used in telescopes, microscopes, mobile phones, AR/VR products, digital cameras, security monitors, multimedia projectors, sights, image measuring equipment, and automobile interior and exterior decorations. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Jiaxing, China.

2.Name: Mr. Zhouzhong  Yu
